page.title: 15The clothes we wear
page.content: In{winter,}on school days I normally wear{school uniform}which is a white cotton blouse, a grey skirt, a red and blue striped tie and a school jumper which is royal blue with Meadows School embroidered on it in red.When it snows I wear{wellington boots}which are made out of rubber or plastic so they don't leak.Last winter the fashion was{ankle boots.}We wear long socks over the knee. Boys wear shirts and trousers and jumpers. In the summer I wear cotton dresses or skirts and T-shirts.I wear ankle socks and sandals which are a lot cooler than shoes. {Kagoules}are wind and rain proof coats made of nylon.Other coats keep out other kinds of weather. Some winter coats are lined with wool to keep out the cold.
